attributes.action: Take action on China and make sanctions on trade.
attributes.additional_details: From Human right abuses, to the elimination of free speech in Hong Kong, what China is doing is against everything we and our allies stand for. I have recently seen on the news that Borris Johnson plans to strengthen ties with China “whatever the occasional political difficulties”, this is not ok. China is threatening war on Taiwan and increasing hostility is the south/east china sea, I don't think threatening war on an ally of America is a "occasional political difficultly"
attributes.background: Step in line with Joe Biden's new America and confront Beijing. Cut trade with China and strengthen our ties with our allies.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551488.

You could start a petition calling for sanctions on China for its treatment of Hong Kong, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
